title: Update to a much later version of skia (m80)
body:
**Description of Change**

Update to the latest (m80 at this time) version of skia.

**This has been published that to the internal feed as 2.80.0-pr.986.37**

**Tasks**

- [X] Merge native skia
- [X] Get native skia building
    - [X] Hacking out the problems so it compiles
    - [x] Fixing the problems properly
    - [x] Bind any new members that are essential
- [x] Update the managed bindings
    - [x] Hacking out the problems so it compiles
    - [x] Fixing/adding unit tests
    - [x] Fixing the problems properly
    - [x] Bind any new members that are essential
- [x] Update all source libraries _(this shouldn't be too much work as these APIs are the same)_
    - [x] SkiaSharp.Views _(there are a LOT of platforms)_
    - [x] SkiaSharp.Views.Forms
- [x] Update all samples _(there are even more samples)_
    - [x] Update basic samples
    - [x] Update feature samples

**Bugs Fixed**

 - Possibly a few...
 - Fixes #711

**API & Behavioral Changes**

Changes so far (excluding the changes listed in https://github.com/mono/skia/pull/64):

 - New minimum versions
    - Android API 16 (Jelly Bean)
    - Ubuntu 16.04 with later Clang versions (only for the default builds, but you can always build some ancient Linux if you build your own Clang)
    - UWP 10.0.16299 (Fall Creators Update)
 - Using Docker images on CI to build Linux
    - You can still build on Linux without Docker (you just need to manually install the tools)
 - HarfBuzz updated to v2.6.2
 - Targeting the newer tools
    - mono 6.4.0
    - Xcode 11
    - .NET Core 3.0
    - VS 2019
 - TODO
